titlepage.titleproper: Preliminary Inventory to the A. Daniel O'Neal Papers, 1973-1979
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1998 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: A. Daniel O'Neal Papers,
did.abstract: Speeches and writings, correspondence, reports, memoranda, legal documents, notes, and printed matter, relating to federal regulation of interstate commerce, and especially to regulation of railways and motor carriers.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], A. Daniel O'Neal Papers, [Box no.] , Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1988.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

chronitem.event: Legal Assistant, Office of Senator Warren Magnuson
Surface Transportation Counsel, Senate Commerce Committee
Board of Directors, U.S. Railway Association

did.unittitle: BIOGRAPHICAL FILE.
SPEECHES AND WRITINGS, 1973-1979.

scopecontent.p: Speech transcripts, interviews, correspondence, printed material, agenda, newsletters, outlines and notes relating primarily to the Interstate Commerce Commission and transportation issues. Arranged chronologically.

did.unittitle: INTERSTATE COMMERCE COMMISSION, PERSONAL OFFICE FILES, 1973-1979.

scopecontent.p: Travel forms, appointment calendars, conference materials, miscellany, correspondence, invitations, clippings, press releases, and tally sheets (commission voting records). Arranged alphabetically by form.

did.unittitle: INTERSTATE COMMERCE COMMISSION, GENERAL OFFICE FILES, 1969-1982.

scopecontent.p: Memoranda, notes, correspondence, press releases, printed material, biographies, legislation, reports, hearing transcripts, and meeting materials. Arranged alphabetically by subject.

did.unittitle: INTERSTATE COMMERCE COMMISSION DECISIONS, 1970-1979.

scopecontent.p: Memoranda, correspondence, legal documents, notes, printed material, charts, budgets, conference materials, and reports. Arranged alphabetically by decision designation code.

did.unittitle: SUBJECT FILE, 1972-1980.

scopecontent.p: Reports, printed material, correspondence, notes, conference materials, memoranda, speeches, legal documents, charts, press releases, regulations, maps and meeting notes. Arranged alphabetically by subject.
